did.unittitle: Coordinating Board, Texas College and University System Records

origination.corpname: Coordinating Board, Texas College and University System

did.abstract: This collection arrived at the archives in relatively good order, which has been maintained where possible. The collection consists of Audit Reports, Correspondence, Board Minutes, Proposals, Reports, Rules and Regulations, Resolutions, and Statements.

bioghist.head: Historical Note:
bioghist.p: The Coordinating Board, Texas College and University System, is a statutory board appointed by the Governor. It is responsible for statewide planning and policy-making to assure quality and efficiency in Texas higher education. The Board's primary areas of responsibility are financial planning, senior colleges and universities, community colleges, and continuing education, health affairs, student services and campus planning.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use:
userestrict.p: Special Collections owns the physical items in our collections, but copyright normally belongs to the creator of the materials or their heirs. The researcher has full responsibility for determining copyright status, obtaining permission to publish from copyright holders, and abiding by current copyright laws when publishing or displaying copies of Special Collections material in print or electronic form. For more information, consult the appropriate librarian. Reproduction decisions will be made by Special Collections staff on a case-by-case basis.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Information of acquisition method not available.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: Coordinating Board, Texas College and University System Records. Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries. To cite a specific item from this collection, please consult the most recent edition of your style manual for the proper formatting. See the Citing Special Collections Materials page for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection arrived at the archives in relatively good order, which has been maintained where possible. The collection consists of Audit Reports, Correspondence, Board Minutes, Proposals, Reports, Rules and Regulations, Resolutions, and Statements.
